item.title: Welcome to Karuta Theme
item.description: Welcome to Karuta Welcome to the Karuta Hugo theme demo! This theme is designed with simplicity and readability in mind, featuring a clean card-style layout that works beautifully for blogs and personal websites. Key Features 🎴 Card-Style Layout The theme presents your content in elegant cards that are easy to scan and read. 🔍 Client-Side Search Use the search functionality to quickly find posts without any server requests. 🌓 Dark/Light Mode Toggle between dark and light themes to suit your preference.
